mng: bird, (dialect) to pay attention to, (intensifier) damned, goddam

exm.mng: to get a bird's-eye view, bird's-eye view, broad overview
lit. birdsong and fragrant flowers (idiom); fig. the intoxication of a beautiful spring day
bird's nest, nickname for Beijing 2008 Olympic stadium
(coll.) sb new to a particular subject, rookie, beginner, newbie
